basics.name: Andrés Peldoza
basics.label: Data Scientist, Dev, Industrial Engineer, Naval Officer

work.name: Hidoservice
work.summary: As a Business Intelligence Engineer at Hidroservice, I digitized and automated maintenance reporting processes, optimized procurement and inventory, and developed predictive maintenance models. Additionally, as a Contract Administrator, I designed and analyzed contracts, allocated resources, and monitored KPIs to ensure efficient contract operations.

work.name: Medical Center Prat
work.summary: Planned maintenance for medical equipment, managed institutional agreements, and developed economic evaluations for clinical projects. I oversaw billing and credit operations, monitored the financial status of the center, and conducted balance analysis and interpretation.

work.name: FLSmidth
work.summary: Managed attendance tracking, verified contracts and employee records, and planned training courses and professional development programs. My role ensured compliance with company policies and facilitated continuous employee development.

work.name: Chilean Navy
work.summary: As an Electronic Officer and Flight Deck Officer on the OPV 'Piloto Pardo' (2014-2015), I planned radar and navigation equipment maintenance, trained crews in fire and flood control, and served as Officer of the Watch during UNITAS LIV (Colombia) and JIATF-S (Panama). On the LSDH 'Sargento Aldea', as Armament Officer and Air Control Officer, I coordinated humanitarian aid logistics, managed aerial support in disaster zones, led damage control teams, and provided counterintelligence training.

certificates.name: Databases and SQL for Data Science
Python for Data Science and AI
